definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因为附有条件，这份遗产便失去了一半价值。

sentences.english: The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每亩可节约种子费500多元，工本费可节省一半。

sentences.english: Many reasons for nosebleeds, but about half of them can not find reason.
sentences.chinese: 流鼻血的原因很多，但是约有一半人找不出原因的。

sentences.english: Mountain half marathon in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 山一半在杯的马拉松隆起，不列颠哥伦比亚，加拿大。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 将近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平处于贫困线以下。

sentences.english: A half-written ebook is no good to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 写到一半的书对谁都没有好处。

sentences.english: Helene, Sorry I only told you half of the story.
sentences.chinese: 海伦抱歉我只告诉了你事情的一半。

sentences.english: She bought a coat that had been knocked down to half-price.
sentences.chinese: 她买了一件降了一半价的衣服。

sentences.english: She poured too vigorously and half the gingerale foamed away.
sentences.chinese: 她倒得太猛，一半的姜汽水冒泡溢出。

sentences.english: Half of the time, their eyes will not be on you.
sentences.chinese: 有一半的时间，他们的目光都不会在你的身上。

sentences.english: Antibiotic use is half of the drug-resistance equation, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，抗生素的应用占耐药性原因的一半。

sentences.english: In the US, there are barely half as many established companies as there are start-up businesses.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，仅有一半的知名企业为初创企业。

sentences.english: Peng Shuilin had half of his body amputated after being run over by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 彭水林被一辆卡车辗过，一半身体被截肢后。

sentences.english: When I was halfway there, the streetcar passed me.
sentences.chinese: 当我走到一半的路程时，那辆电车经过了我。

sentences.english: The center of this groove is also half-way from the ceiling to the floor of the Grand Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这些槽的中央也是从走廊的天花板都地面距离的一半。

sentences.english: To surrender means to give up half your wager and not complete the hand.
sentences.chinese: 投降就是放弃您一半的赌注同时放弃这局牌。

definition: almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
